text: Phwk than cng klaw theid rea di sraththa tx xallxh læa sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kæ rea læa sing thi thuk prathan lng ma kæ xi brxhim læa xis ma xil læa xis hak læa yax kub læa brrda wngswan hela nan læa sing thi mu sa læa xi sa di rab læa sing thi br rda na bi di rab cak phracea khxng phwk khea phwk rea midi bængyæk rahwang than hnung than dı cak khea hela nan læa phwk rea ca pen phu swamiphakdi tx phraxngkh theanan
